about.description: With more than 1 year of experience in the software development industry, I have skills in areas such as Data Engineering, Data Science and Backend Development, and currently, I focus a bit more on Frontend Development, always making sure to write clean and scalable code.
about.learning: (Also I'm learning how to use AI models like {{Whisper}}, {{PyAnnote}} & {{Phi-3-mini}})

timeline.technologist: Technologist in software analysis and development

studies.description: I owe a lot of my knowledge to the SENA institution. There I learned the basics of programming, logic, algorithms, and I also took my first steps with some of the frameworks in which I currently perform best. I met many people who transcended my life and who today I can call friends, and I lived many stories to tell. Also, SENA gave me one of the most exciting and enriching experiences of my entire life, you will see it below...

senaSoft.description: SENASoft is a SENA competition held annually in Colombia at a national level, in which hundreds of students from the institution compete for a week through different categories of the software industry, in one of the main SENA headquarters around the country. In the 2023 edition, held in Pereira, Risaralda, I participated with my classmate Sory Gonzales in the Data Engineering category, a category sponsored by the company QVision Technologies, in which skills in Microsoft technologies such as SQL Server, SQL Server Integration Services, SQL Analysis Services and PowerBI are required. After 6 months of preparation, we managed to get {{firstPlace}}, in one of the most exciting experiences I have ever had!
